context.p: You can distribute a framework with a series of already configured validation scenarios. Also, this provides enhanced validation support allowing you to use multiple grammars to check the document. For example, you can use Schematron rules to impose guidelines, otherwise impossible to enforce using conventional validation.
To associate a validation scenario with a specific framework, follow these steps:

step.cmd: and go to Document Type Associations. Open the Document Type dialog for the SDF framework, then choose the Validation tab. This tab holds a list of document types for which you can define validation scenarios. To set one of the validation scenarios as default for a specific document type, select it and press / Toggle default.
